data_table.description: MRI Scans and Neuropsychological (NP) Battery Dates and Exclusions for Generation 3 Participants, 2009 - 2012. This dataset contains possible exclusions that can be used when analyzing the datasets t_mrbrnm1_2011_m_0891, t_mrbrnm2_2012_a_0892 and vr_np_2012_a_0893. This dataset contains brain MRI and NP dates for exclusions only. To get a complete set of MRI or NP dates see separate datasets containing test dates.

variable.name: np_excludeON
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent other neurological conditions at the time of NP

variable.name: np_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent dementia at the time of NP
variable.value: Unknown status at time of NP

variable.name: np_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent stroke at the time of NP

variable.name: mri_excludeON
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent other neurological conditions at the time of MRI

variable.name: mri_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent dementia at the time of MRI
variable.value: Unknown status at time of MRI

variable.name: mri_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent stroke at the time of MRI

variable.name: mri_date
variable.comment: For display purposes, only month and year are listed. Number of days since Exam 1.

variable.name: np_date
variable.comment: For display purposes, only month and year are listed. Number of days since Exam 1.
